The following redirect plugins were dete: The following redirect plugins were detected on your site and can be imported from.
Problems were detected with your databas: Problems were detected with your database tables. Please visit the support page for more details.
Redirection requires WordPress v%1s, you: Redirection requires WordPress v%1s, you are using v%2s - please update your WordPress
Create associated redirect (added to end: Create associated redirect (added to end of URL)
<code>Redirectioni10n</code> is not defi: Redirectioni10n is not defined. This usually means another plugin is blocking Redirection from loading. Please disable all plugins and try again.
If the magic button doesn't work then yo: If the magic button doesn't work then you should read the error and see if you can fix it manually, otherwise follow the 'Need help' section below.
Monitor trashed items (will create disab: Monitor binned items (will create disabled redirects)
Your server has rejected the request for: Your server has rejected the request for being too big. You will need to change it to continue.
Also check if your browser is able to lo: Also check if your browser is able to load redirection.js:
If you are using a page caching plugin o: If you are using a page caching plugin or service (CloudFlare, OVH, etc) then you can also try clearing that cache.
All redirects have a valid group: All redirects have a valid group
No valid groups, so you will not be able: No valid groups, so you will not be able to create any redirects
Please clear your browser cache and relo: Please clear your browser cache and reload this page.
The data on this page has expired, pleas: The data on this page has expired, please reload.
WordPress did not return a response. Thi: WordPress did not return a response. This could mean an error occurred or that the request was blocked. Please check your server error_log.
Your server returned a 403 Forbidden err: Your server returned a 403 Forbidden error which may indicate the request was blocked. Are you using a firewall or a security plugin?
WordPress returned an unexpected message: WordPress returned an unexpected message. This usually indicates that a plugin or theme is outputting data when it shouldn't be. Please try disabling other plugins and try again.
If the issue isn't known then try disabl: If the issue isn't known then try disabling other plugins - it's easy to do, and you can re-enable them quickly. Other plugins can sometimes cause conflicts.
Include these details in your report {{s: Include these details in your report {{strong}}along with a description of what you were doing{{/strong}}.
If you think Redirection is at fault the: If you think Redirection is at fault then create an issue.
This may be caused by another plugin - l: This may be caused by another plugin - look at your browser's error console for more details.
{{strong}}CSV file format{{/strong}}: {{: {{strong}}CSV file format{{/strong}}: {{code}}source URL, target URL{{/code}} - and can be optionally followed with {{code}}regex, http code{{/code}} ({{code}}regex{{/code}} - 0 for no, 1 for yes).
Redirection is not working. Try clearing: Redirection is not working. Try clearing your browser cache and reloading this page.
If that doesn't help, open your browser': If that doesn't help, open your browser's error console and create a {{link}}new issue{{/link}} with the details.
If this is a new problem then please eit: If this is a new problem then please either {{strong}}create a new issue{{/strong}} or send it in an {{strong}}email{{/strong}}. Include a description of what you were trying to do and the important details listed below. Please include a screenshot.
First check the FAQ below. If you contin: First check the FAQ below. If you continue to have a problem then please disable all other plugins and check if the problem persists.
You can report bugs and new suggestions: You can report bugs and new suggestions in the Github repository. Please provide as much information as possible, with screenshots, to help explain your issue.
Please note that any support is provide: Please note that any support is provide on as-time-is-available basis and is not guaranteed. I do not provide paid support.
If you want to submit information that y: If you want to submit information that you don't want in a public repository then send it directly via {{email}}email{{/email}}.
No, and it isnt advised that you do so. A 404 error is the correct response to return for a page that doesn't exist. If you redirect it you are indicating that it once existed, and this could dilute your site.
Used to auto-generate a URL if no URL is: Used to auto-generate a URL if no URL is given. Use the special tags {{code}}$dec${{/code}} or {{code}}$hex${{/code}} to insert a unique ID inserted
Enter the full path and filename if you: Enter the full path and filename if you want Redirection to automatically update your {{code}}.htaccess{{/code}}.
Import a CSV, .htaccess, or JSON file.
Click 'Add File' or drag and drop here.
Double-check the file is the correct for: Double-check the file is the correct format!
All imports will be appended to the curr: All imports will be appended to the current database.
Export to CSV, Apache .htaccess, Nginx,: Export to CSV, Apache .htaccess, Nginx, or Redirection JSON (which contains all redirects and groups).
Log files can be exported from the log p: Log files can be exported from the log pages.
Please mention {{code}}%s{{/code}}, and: Please mention {{code}}%s{{/code}}, and explain what you were doing at the time

Title: Title
I was trying to do a thing and it went w: I was trying to do a thing and it went wrong. It may be a temporary issue and if you try again it might work - great!
It didn't work when I tried again: It didn't work when I tried again
See if your problem is described on the: See if your problem is described on the list of outstanding {{link}}Redirection issues{{/link}}. Please add more details if you find the same problem.
Sorry, something went wrong loading the: Sorry, something went wrong loading the data - please try again
Delete the logs - are you sure?: Delete the logs - are you sure?
Once deleted your current logs will no l: Once deleted your current logs will no longer be available. You can set a delete schedule from the Redirection options if you want to do this automatically.
Thanks for subscribing! {{a}}Click here{: Thanks for subscribing! {{a}}Click here{{/a}} if you need to return to your subscription.
Want to keep up to date with changes to: Want to keep up to date with changes to Redirection?
Sign up for the tiny Redirection newslet: Sign up for the tiny Redirection newsletter - a low volume newsletter about new features and changes to the plugin. Ideal if want to test beta changes before release.
I deleted a redirection, why is it still: I deleted a redirection, why is it still redirecting?
Your browser will cache redirections. If: Your browser will cache redirections. If you have deleted a redirection and your browser is still performing the redirection then {{a}}clear your browser cache{{/a}}.
Can I open a redirect in a new tab?: Can I open a redirect in a new tab?
It's not possible to do this on the serv: It's not possible to do this on the server. Instead you will need to add {{code}}target="_blank"{{/code}} to your link.
You've supported this plugin - thank you: You've supported this plugin - thank you!
You get useful software and I get to car: You get useful software and I get to carry on making it better.
Delete the plugin - are you sure?: Delete the plugin - are you sure?
Deleting the plugin will remove all your: Deleting the plugin will remove all your redirections, logs, and settings. Do this if you want to remove the plugin for good, or if you want to reset the plugin.
Once deleted your redirections will stop: Once deleted your redirections will stop working. If they appear to continue working then please clear your browser cache.
Manage all your 301 redirects and monito: Manage all your 301 redirects and monitor 404 errors
Redirection is free to use - life is won: Redirection is free to use - life is wonderful and lovely! It has required a great deal of time and effort to develop and you can help support this development by {{strong}}making a small donation{{/strong}}.
A unique token allowing feed readers acc: A unique token allowing feed readers access to Redirection log RSS (leave blank to auto-generate)
I'm a nice person and I have helped supp: I'm a nice person and I have helped support the author of this plugin
Use groups to organise your redirects. G: Use groups to organise your redirects. Groups are assigned to a module, which affects how the redirects in that group work. If you are unsure then stick to the WordPress module.
